author: jsdelfino
msg: Working Web service component using Axis2C 1.6. Some fixes to the JSON conversion functions to correctly handle all cases of nested objects and arrays. Added support for component properties, the Web service component has a URI property that can be configured to the address of the target Web service.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor improvements to java component support, use one classloader per component, use Iterables instead of arrays to represent lists, added more tests and a working java version of the store integration test.

author: lresende
msg: TUSCANY-3428 - Adding provider factory for wire format to be merged into the bundle jar
